FuncDef:
The loop-detect trigger disable command disables proactive loop detection upon an interface Up state.
The undo loop-detect trigger disable command enables proactive loop detection upon interface Up.
By default, proactive loop detection upon interface Up is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable or disable the proactive loop detection upon interface Up function on an interface, run the undo loop-detect trigger disable command.
Precautions
Proactive loop detection fails to take effect on interfaces that have STP, local loopback, loop detection, or loopback detection enabled.
